hero.title: Train in
hero.description: Hello, I'm Maryline Brosset, certified trainer for teachers. I support you in your digital transformation with practical and personalized training.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Passionate about education and innovation, I put my expertise at the service of teachers for a 21st century school.
about.bio1: A teacher for over 10 years, I have always been convinced that digital technology and artificial intelligence are tremendous levers for enriching teaching practices.
about.bio2: In 2019, I created Owl Formation to share my expertise and support my fellow teachers in developing their digital skills. Today, I train hundreds of teachers each year in digital tools and generative AI.
about.bio3: My mission: make technology accessible to everyone and transform teaching through digital!

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Quickly find answers to your questions

items.question: How can I finance my training?
items.answer: All our training courses are eligible for OPCO (Skills Operators) funding. As a school or teacher, you can apply for coverage from your OPCO. I support you in building your file and provide all necessary documents (detailed program, quote, Qualiopi certificate, etc.).

items.question: What are the technical prerequisites?
items.answer: For most training courses, you will need a laptop with a stable internet connection. Some specific training may require the installation of free software that I will indicate in advance. No advanced technical skills are required - my training is designed for all levels.

items.question: Are the training courses certified?
items.answer: Yes! All our training courses result in the issuance of a training certificate. Owl Formation is Qualiopi certified, a quality guarantee recognized by the State. You will also receive a certificate of attendance and a certificate of completion at the end of your training.

items.question: Do you offer online training?
items.answer: Yes, I offer my training in three formats: in-person at your institution, online via videoconference (Zoom, Teams), or in hybrid format. Online format offers the same pedagogical quality with interactive sessions, practical workshops and personalized follow-up.

items.question: How many participants per session?
items.answer: To guarantee quality support, I limit my sessions to a maximum of 15 participants. This allows me to offer personalized follow-up to each participant and answer everyone's specific questions. For larger groups, we can organize multiple sessions.

items.question: Can I customize the content of a training?
items.answer: Absolutely! I offer custom training adapted to your specific needs. We discuss beforehand to understand your objectives, context and constraints. I then design a personalized program with examples and practical cases adapted to your teaching reality.

items.question: What is the lead time to organize training?
items.answer: I can generally organize training within 2 to 4 weeks. For urgent requests, don't hesitate to contact me - I do my best to adapt to your constraints. The deadline may be longer if you go through OPCO funding (allow 4 to 6 weeks for file processing).

items.question: Do you offer follow-up after training?
items.answer: Yes! All my training includes post-training follow-up. Depending on the package chosen, you benefit from access to the Moodle platform (from 1 to 6 months) with course materials, additional resources and a help forum. I also remain available by email to answer your questions.
